apache community i know best i think people here find site useful we've loaded bit over 4,000,000 emails across 500 lists http apache.markmail.org you'll see chart home page one our goals site has been focus heavily analytics we have lots graphs counts you're able use them watch apache's historical growth each individual project's growth every query you write gets its own histogram chart previous result j k move up down thread view there's lot little things like plus your result message includes office pdf files they're line interactive too http apache.markmail.org search ext:ppt axis overall how can i make work thanks ryan henson pdfaction.java author ryan henson created july 7 2008 purpose file takes input source converts pdf returns package org.airybsa.struts.control import java.io.outputstream import java.io.outputstreamwriter import java.net.url import java.net.urlconnection import javax.servlet.http.httpservletrequest import javax.servlet.http.httpservletresponse import org.apache.struts.action.actionform import org.apache.struts.action.actionforward import org.apache.struts.action.actionmapping import org.apache.struts.actions.dispatchaction import com.lowagie.text import com.lowagie.text.html.htmlparser import com.lowagie.text.pdf.pdfwriter public class pdfaction extends dispatchaction public actionforward makepdf actionmapping mapping actionform form httpservletrequest request httpservletresponse response throws exception try prepare string key value pairs string paramstr func getreport print true reportid 1 selectedids 315,158 post requests required have content length string lengthstring string.valueof paramstr.length establish connection application url url new url http localhost 8080 airyschedule getreport.do urlconnection con url.openconnection configure connection allow operations necessary 1 turn off all caching so each new request response made from fresh connection servlet 2 indicate client attempt send read data from servlet con.setusecaches false con.setdefaultusecaches false con.setdoinput true con.setdooutput true set content type we posting length data con.setrequestproperty content type application x www form urlencoded con.setrequestproperty content length lengthstring outputstream os con.getoutputstream outputstreamwriter osw new outputstreamwriter os send data servlet osw.write paramstr osw.flush osw.close document document new document document.setpagesize pagesize.a4 rotate outputstream out response.getoutputstream response.addheader content type application pdf response.addheader content disposition attachment filename unnamed.pdf response.addheader content length cachedurl.length try pdfwriter.getinstance document out htmlparser.parse document con.getinputstream catch exception e log.error e catch throwable t log.error t return null

tiles.apache.org_users_200911_9 2009 11 15 todd nine todd.nine gmail.com i extend existing spring class dynamically determine which page defined body definition works well however i want each my body pages define what title layout page i think you may solve both your needs custom body custom title using preparer placeholder definition name prefix template web inf views layouts default.jsp preparer my.preparer put attribute name title value default title put attribute name header value web inf views tiles header.jsp put attribute name menu value web inf views tiles menu.jsp put attribute name footer value web inf views tiles footer.jsp put attribute name body value web inf edit 2 jsp definition you can even mix placeholders preparer name see http tiles.apache.org framework tutorial advanced preparer.html http tiles.apache.org framework tutorial advanced wildcard.html hth anton

tiles.apache.org_users_200706_4 2007 6 4 gert vanthienen gert.vanthienen skynet.be i have created tiles.xml file define see below template.webshop which insert two column body navigation content jsp page webshop.home uses template.webshop fills navigation content attributes however tiles complains about attribute content found when showing webshop.home definition why can't you insert page which contains tiles:insertattribute tags itself jsp pages used attribute never used templates probably you wanted fill navigation content attributes two_column_body.jsp basic.jsp definition name template.webshop templates templates basic.jsp put attribute name header value templates shopping_header.jsp put attribute name body value templates two_column_body.jsp definition definition name webshop.home extends template.webshop put attribute name navigation value templates navigation_collapsed.jsp put attribute name content value home.jsp definition change way definition name template.webshop templates templates basic.jsp put attribute name header value templates shopping_header.jsp definition definition name webshop.home.body templates templates two_column_body.jsp put attribute name navigation value templates navigation_collapsed.jsp put attribute name content value home.jsp definition definition name webshop.home extends template.webshop put attribute name body value webshop.home.body definition hth antonio

void afterpropertiesset throws tilesexception tilescontainer container createtilescontainer this.servletcontext tilesaccess.setcontainer this.servletcontext container protected tilescontainer createtilescontainer servletcontext context throws tilesexception servletcontextadapter adaptedcontext new servletcontextadapter new delegatingservletconfig tilescontainerfactory factory tilescontainerfactory.getfactory adaptedcontext return factory.createcontainer adaptedcontext where afterpropertiesset method which needs invoked order initialize tiles delegatingservletconfig simple inner class tilesconfigurer which makes configurer's settings according factory preparer implementations use tiles available initial servlet property settings can anyone confirm bug within tiles2 just me who's using tiles wrong way thx lot greez dirk

tiles.apache.org_users_200708_24 2007 8 27 schaefer dirk alexander dirk.a.schaefer bluewin.ch hello all following up email sent before i spend bit more time investigating problem found following consider following tile initialized using org.apache.tiles.definition.urldefinitionsfactory now when request receives tiles container instructed render specific tiles definition following happens interessing parts 1 invoke definition getdefinition string name tilesrequestcontext tilescontext urldefinitionfactory 2 from invoke definitions getdefinitions urldefinitionfactory 3 instance attribute definitions null from invoke definitions readdefinitions urldefinitionfactory within third call configuration actually parsed beans instances what ever defined within configuration file s ar created unfortunatelly urldefinitionfactory does synchronize call definitions readdefinitions method result multiple request received servlet container once has other request been received so long we get classical multi threading problematics where each thread bothering others process creating definitions list crashs i think where's rub can anyone confirm great analysis dirk can you open jira issue thanks antonio

universia.net www.universia.es http www.universia.es aviso legal este mensaje es privado y confidencial y solamente para la persona la que va dirigido si usted ha recibido este mensaje por error debe revelar copiar distribuir o usarlo en ningún sentido le rogamos lo comunique al remitente y borre dicho mensaje y cualquier documento adjunto que pudiera contener hay renuncia la confidencialidad ni ningún privilegio por causa de transmisión errónea o mal funcionamiento cualquier opinión expresada en este mensaje pertenece únicamente al autor remitente y representa necesariamente la opinión de universia ser que expresamente se diga y el remitente esté autorizado para hacerlo los correos electrónicos son seguros garantizan la confidencialidad ni la correcta recepción de los mismos dado que pueden ser interceptados manipulados destruidos llegar con demora incompletos o con virus universia se hace responsable de las alteraciones que pudieran hacerse al mensaje una vez enviado este mensaje sólo tiene una finalidad de información y debe interpretarse como una oferta de venta o de compra de bienes o servicios en el caso de que el destinatario de este mensaje consintiera la utilización del correo electrónico via internet rogamos lo ponga en nuestro conocimiento disclaimer message private confidential intended exclusively addressee you receive message mistake you should disseminate distribute copy e mail please inform sender delete message attachments from your system confidentiality nor any privilege regarding information waived lost any mistransmission malfunction any views opinions contained message solely those author do necessarily represent those universia unless otherwise specifically stated sender authorised do so e mail transmission cannot guaranteed secure confidential error free information could intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late incomplete contain viruses universia does accept responsibility any changes contents message after has been sent message provided informational purposes should construed solicitation offer buy sell any services goods addressee message does consent use internet e mail please communicate us

tiles.apache.org_users_200904_8 looks like you have some infinite recursion going your action name showlisting struts.xml returns success which causes tiles process definition name listing page tiles.xml which processes pages tiles listing.jsp includes s:action name showlisting which return success which execute's result sending tiles listing page which includes listing.jsp runs showlisting action until stack runs out space you shouldn't need use s:action tag inside your tile time you're processing tile action has already run chris wed apr 1 2009 9 56 pm joea88 khamail gmail.com wrote i have struct action tag my body.jsp something like div title div div listings s:action name showlisting executeresult true s:action div struts.xml action name sholisting class showlistingaction result name success type tiles listing page result action tiles.xml definition name listing page template pages tiles listing.jsp extends layout base put attribute name listing details value listing details.jsp definition when s:action executed instead inserting returned listing.jsp body.jsp content body.jsp got rendered again again until stackoverflowerror exception thrown everything fine tiles version 2.0.5 please anyone help me view message context http www.nabble.com stackoverflow error tiles 2.1.2 tp22840882p22840882 html sent from tiles users mailing list archive nabble.com

required 3 use maven build test your code 4 create patch svn diff patchfile.txt 5 attach patch file jira ticket you don't see anything list you have other ideas tiles we're interested those too open start check out list open issues https issues.apache.org struts sr jira.issueviews:searchrequest printable temp searchrequest.html pid 10160 status 1 status 3 status 4 sorter field issuekey sorter order desc tempmax 1000 you can see here everything from dimensions kaolin incubation database driven tiles definitions all sorts interesting enhancements please have look list find things interest you submit patch how do you submit patch it's quite simple here's quick guide 1 check out source code svn co https svn.apache.org repos asf tiles framework trunk appropriate repo 2 make changes required 3 use maven build test your code 4 create patch svn diff patchfile.txt 5 attach patch file jira ticket you don't see anything list you have other ideas tiles we're interested those too open jira ticket do above steps implement your changes framework code doesn't interest you we could always use documentation examples even snazzy screenshots icons after you've done few times don't surprised you see invitation become tiles committer you still feel lost want help i provide personal assistance via email chat anyone who wants step up do more doesn't know where start feel free email me privately you need help i absolutely do what i can i think tiles can grow succeed necessitates involvement many people you benefiting from tiles please step up do what you can you benefiting your opportunity become hero thanks greg

tiles.apache.org_users_200805_30 answer you have specify result type part result annotation like so results result name success value startapplication type tilesresult.class result name error value error.jsp type tilesresult.class class definition wes original message from gamble wesley wg10 mailto:wg10 tmw.com sent monday may 19 2008 5 37 pm users tiles.apache.org subject struts 2 annotations tiles 2 can i use struts 2 annotation style specifying action results set tile name target struts action here's my action result name success value startapplication public class applicationstartaction private string pagetitle private string companyname public string execute throws exception pagetitle start job application companyname men's wearhouse return success getters setters here here's my tiles.xml file doctype tiles definitions public apache software foundation dtd tiles configuration 2.0 en http tiles.apache.org dtds tiles config_2_0 dtd tiles definitions definition name baselayout template layouts base.jsp put attribute name head value tiles head.jsp put attribute name body value tiles body.jsp definition definition name startapplication extends baselayout definition tiles definitions when i attempt execute applicationstartaction i get error requested resource applicanttracking startapplication available which i assume mean action result mapping tile definition working thanks wes

tiles.apache.org_users_200710_11 antonio i had same problem when upgrading from struts 2.0.6 struts 2.0.9 i get you right breaks down you can extend templates tiles templates can represent whole pages parts them use templates tiles i.e sub page you need separate definition fill attributes template only definition can used tile page definition which may extend master template right behaviour different tiles plugin struts 2.0.6 possible extend master template various levels more specialized templates adding extra attributes sub page templates way while being able overwrite any attribute any previous level special reason change antonio petrelli 3 wrote 2007 7 31 neil aggarwal neil jammconsulting.com solution second sentence faq snip case usually you have create new definition extending from existing one fill attribute correct template assign new definition attribute main template snip other words definition name product.nav template productnavlayout.jsp put attribute name productpathnav value productpathnav.jsp put attribute name productnav value productnav.jsp definition definition name product.nav.extended extends product.nav put attribute name productcontent value product.grid definition definition name page.products extends layout put attribute name content value product.nav.extended definition hth antonio view message context http www.nabble.com nesting tiles 3 levels deep finding attribute tf4179213 html a13087898 sent from tiles users mailing list archive nabble.com
tiles.apache.org_users_200710_12 2007 10 8 marcus oenicke m.oenicke it4u berlin.biz antonio i had same problem when upgrading from struts 2.0.6 struts 2.0.9 i get you right breaks down you can extend templates tiles templates can represent whole pages parts them use templates tiles i.e sub page you need separate definition fill attributes template only definition can used tile page definition which may extend master template right behaviour different tiles plugin struts 2.0.6 possible extend master template various levels more specialized templates adding extra attributes sub page templates way while being able overwrite any attribute any previous level special reason change err sorry i cannot follow you o you can extend definitions you cannot extend templates attributes btw probably concept extension does make sense here extension definition you can override attributes template definition behaviour has never changed since struts tiles antonio

tiles.apache.org_users_200710_38 2007 10 16 baptiste gaillard baptiste.gaillard gmail.com so i suppose i can't extend definition which defined another tiles.xml file try declare them correct order i.e firstly one contains base definition your case datatable contained pages components datatable tiles.xml one contains extended definition userdatatable contained web inf tiles.xml possible do tiles 2 include makup like struts config files seems like so bad idea so please feel free discuss tiles developers mailing list http tiles.apache.org mail lists.html file jira issue antonio

tiles.apache.org_users_200910_1 2009 10 5 smith david w david.w.smith bankofamerica.com wildcards allowed extends attribute tiles definition two reasons first technical since historically tiles loads all definitions resolves all inheritance load time it's impossible do search unresolved parent definition problem however can overcome using non resolving technique potentially slower second about design does make sense have dynamic parent definition antonio

tiles.apache.org_users_201003_9 2010 3 9 gallagher jim uk europe middle east group functions technology services jim.gallagher rbs.co.uk behaviour available struts tiles has been removed from tiles 2.0 i think unintended feature d rules definition you say designed rendered it's purpose hold list security roles roles processed programmatically decides whether user sees menu item entire menu based assigned role tiles has very basic role based security most jsp tags inserttemplate insertattribute insertdefinition have role attribute where you can put comma separated list enabled roles user must under least one role roles can defined xml files too you need something more complicated i think your entry point might definitionsfactory http tiles.apache.org 2.0 framework tutorial extension points.html however i think you should move your rules outside tiles load them separately you have more questions how implement definitionsfactory feel free ask here antonio p.s i strongly suggest migrate least tiles 2.1 x new features like wildcards el expressions can help development lot moreover api cleaner

tiles.apache.org_users_201003_17 hi we using tiles 2.1.4 servlet environment using resolvinglocaleurldefinitiondao load tiles definition xml files cache them memory we have need hot deploy refresh tile definition xml changes therefore call refresh urldefinitionsfactory after pushing out tile definition xml changes turn calls refresh our definitiondao all works fine except case described below where refresh sometimes does pick up definition changes thoughts whether we misconfigured bug framework appreciated my understanding how request locales handled tiles stores memory cache tile definition sets keyed locale definitions built lazily requests come based locale request locale request doesn't yet have definitions associated definitions built locale parent locales fly cached my understanding how refresh managed global data structure caches last modified dates tile definition xml files whenever definitions read from files last modified dates updated upon refresh cached last modified dates compared actual last modified date each xml file file system determine refresh needed problem lazy loading definition sets per request locale contaminates global cache last modified dates following situation updated tile definition xml files pushed onto servers servers continue field requests request previously unseen locale comes causing set definitions built locale parent locales updated xmls processed from file system new locale only which updates global cache xml file last modified dates we call refresh which compares file system last modified dates cached ones only rebuilds differ since global cache last modified dates updated previous step framework doesn't detect anything has changed still holds out dated definitions all locales other than new ones come after xml file push some locales now out sync refresh does bring them current since op based updated last mod date cache notion refresh relying global cache last mod dates can updated when only single locale processed appears issue bug misuse thanks jeff reiche

fn:substringbefore meta content fn:trim fn:substringafter meta c:foreach c:foreach items metadata var meta meta name fn:substringbefore meta content fn:trim fn:substringafter meta c:foreach title title title link rel stylesheet href pagecontext.request.contextpath style default.css title default link rel stylesheet href pagecontext.request.contextpath style jquery ui ui lightness jquery ui.css link rel stylesheet href pagecontext.request.contextpath style jquery.alertbox.css c:foreach items styles var s link rel stylesheet href pagecontext.request.contextpath style s c:foreach tiles:insertattribute name style ignore true script src pagecontext.request.contextpath script jquery.js script script src pagecontext.request.contextpath script jquery ui jquery ui.min.js script c:foreach items scripts var s script src pagecontext.request.contextpath script s script c:foreach script tiles:insertattribute name script ignore true script head gives me lots control over what gets included each page here's snippet from tiles.xml definition name default layout template layout default layout.jsp title style styles script scripts body put attribute name menu bar value tiles menu bar.jsp type template put attribute name left nav value tiles left nav.jsp type template definition definition name meal log extends default layout put attribute name title value anodyzed exerceo meal log type string put attribute name body value body meal log.jsp type template put list attribute name styles add attribute value nutrition facts.css type template put list attribute put list attribute name scripts add attribute value jquery.htmlutils.js add attribute value jquery.print.js add attribute value jquery.validate.js put list attribute definition hope gives you some ideas chris wed dec 8
